intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Asahi Pentax M37 lenses, roughly organized by topic.

oemHistLinks.name: The Pentax 'Course of History' Official Historical Timeline
History of Pentax: The Beatles, Tragedy, WW2 (Picture This! Podcast on YouTube)

lensSpecLinks.name: M37-Mount Lenses at PentaxForums.com
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (A highly-active Pentax forum with extensive lens profiles including specs and user-submitted reviews. A highly-recommended resource for all Pentax equipment)

lensSpecLinks.name: M42 Lens DB
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Profles for a large collection of M42 & M37 screwmount lenses made by a variety of manufacturers. Asahi Pentax lenses can be found by filtering by vendor: 'Asahi Optical Co.')

reviewLinks.name: M37-Mount Lenses at PentaxForums.com
reviewLinks.helpText: (The above link is repeated here with good reason: Pentax Forums is one of the best resource I've found for reviews and info on Pentax M37 lenses)

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)
